# About me

:::::: {.grid .justify-content-space-evenly .text-center}
::::: {.g-col-4 .align-self-center}

::::: {.g-col-8 .align-self-center}
Coming from an ecology background, I've always been interested in the relationships between natural and human communities. 
Through my studies I discovered that I have a real knack for learning new systems and an intense curiosity about the inner working of dynamic and statistical models. 

Now, I use a wide variety of modelling techniques to understand how humans impact natural systems, and to provide guidance on how to manage those impacts.
